article_title: Macron calls to halt arms deliveries to Israel in Gaza war
sentence: Monday  will  mark  the  first  anniversary  of  Hamas's  attack  on  Israel  on  7  October,  in  which  about  1,200  people  were  killed  and  251  others  taken  hostage.

article_title: Macron calls to halt arms deliveries to Israel in Gaza war
sentence: More  than  41,000  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  then,  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says.
